Tenzin Education Consultancy & Placement Firm

One of the direct Authorised Agents of Edith Cowan University, Murdoch University and Curtin University in Perth, Western Australia

Offer Letter within 21 days and COE in 14 days

Our Vision

Our vision is to become one of the best choices of education consultancy and placement firm in Bhutan for every student who aspires to study abroad. Our vision reflects our values, integrity and commitment to provide best services.

Our Mission

Our mission is to become one of the leading Education and Consultancy Firm in Bhutan by assisting Bhutanese students in their search for better education programs in abroad to build their career opportunities.

Our Partner Insitutions

❮ ❯

About Us

Tenzin Education Consultancy and Placement Firm (ECPF) is a registered Education Consultancy and Placement Firm under the Department of Adult and Higher Education, Ministry of Education, Bhutan.

We have been in operation since 2017 and have been offering reliable and integrated services solutions to the prospective students of Bhutan who wishes to pursue their further studies in Australia. Our office is managed by well trained and Certified Education Counsellors, and helpful staff to assist prospective students with their enrolment and visa processing. Since inception, we have been a successful agent which we were able to help more than a hundred students to enrol in various study fields in Australia.

Learn more

Our Services

Career Counselling and Enrolment

We offer, free of charge, education advice to help students choose the right and relevant courses at universities in Australia.

Visa Services

As the Australian visa application process is highly complex, we ensure that the application process is as stress-free and straightforward as possible.

Health Insurance

It is a mandatory requirement to have suitable Overseas Student Health Cover (OSHC). We help organize and arrange suitable insurance policies based on individual student needs.
